sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you want to <radical>slice</radical> the <radical>power</radical> out of someone just <kanji>censure</kanji> them. Then they'll be cut down in front of everyone and they'll feel super embarrassed. It's the best way to slice them down without actually cutting them and getting arrested.
meaningInfo: Picture yourself as you slice the power out of that senator you hate by censuring them in front of the world!
readingMnemonic: Once you <kanji>censure</kanji> them and they lose all their power, they'll be just another <reading>guy</reading> (<ja>がい</ja>). A normal guy with everything lost to him. HAHAHA!
readingInfo: Look at that guy now. What a loser.
